sections.heading: 01|Park districts created.Effective:October 1, 1953Latest Legislation:House Bill 1 - 100th General AssemblyPDF:Download Authenticated PDFPark districts may be created which include all or a part of the territory within a county, and the boundary lines of such district shall be so drawn as not to div
sections.text: 01|Park districts created.Effective:October 1, 1953Latest Legislation:House Bill 1 - 100th General AssemblyPDF:Download Authenticated PDFPark districts may be created which include all or a part of the territory within a county, and the boundary lines of such district shall be so drawn as not to divide any existing township or municipal corporation within such county.
